title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. At the same time, dice the bacon and fry it; add the cream along with the bay leaves and nutmeg, and possibly the garlic, simmering until it reduces. Pour the egg yolks into a cup, chop the parsley, and grate the cheese. Drain the pasta and return it to the pot, mix in the sauce, 3/4 of the Parmesan, and 3/4 of the parsley, then mix everything together. Transfer to a nice bowl (an oval dish works beautifully), and use the remaining parsley and Parmesan as a garnish. No salt is added since the bacon and cheese usually provide enough salt; however, you can add more salt if desired.
